empire.label: Empire
empire.description: Whether the nation is an empire

rulers.label: Rulers
rulers.description: The list of rulers of the nation

region.label: Region
region.description: The region the nation is in

effective_territory.label: Effective Territory
effective_territory.description: The nation's maximum territory they can hold before they start suffering penalties

current_territory.label: Current Territory
current_territory.description: The amount of territory the nation currently holds

road_capacity.label: Road Capacity
road_capacity.description: The nation's maximum road capacity that can be used before they start suffering penalties

road_usage.label: Road Usage
road_usage.description: The amount of road capacity the nation is currently using

stability_gain_chance.label: Stability Gain Chance
stability_gain_chance.description: The nation's percentage chance of gaining a level of stability each tick

stability_loss_chance.label: Stability Loss Chance
stability_loss_chance.description: The nation's percentage chance of losing a level of stability each tick

stability_loss_chance_on_leader_death.label: Stability Loss Chance On Leader Death
stability_loss_chance_on_leader_death.description: The nation's percentage chance of losing a level of stability when their leader dies

infamy.label: Infamy
infamy.description: The nation's current level of infamy

wars.label: Wars
wars.description: The list of wars the nation is currently fighting, if any

markets.label: Markets
markets.description: The list of markets the nation is currently a part of, if any

factions.label: Factions
factions.description: The list of factions currently based in the nation, if any

hired_mercenaries.label: Hired Mercenaries
hired_mercenaries.description: The list of mercenaries the nation has currently employed

money.label: Money
money.description: The amount of money the nation currently has

money_capacity.label: Money Capacity
money_capacity.description: The amount of money the nation can hold

money_income.label: Money Income
money_income.description: The amount of money the nation gains each tick

karma.label: Total Karma
karma.description: The total amount of Karma the nation has

rolling_karma.label: Rolling Karma
rolling_karma.description: The amount of rolling karma the nation has.  Rolling karma is increased after getting a bad event, reduced after getting a good event, and reset at the start of each era

temporary_karma.label: Temporary Karma
temporary_karma.description: The amount of temporary karma the nation has.  Temporary karma is removed after each tick

migration_distance.label: Migration Distance
migration_distance.description: The distance this nation can migrate each session

stationary_delay.label: Stationary Delay
stationary_delay.description: The amount of sessions a nomadic nation can stay in once place before suffering penalties

primary_race.label: Primary Race
primary_race.description: The primary race of the nation

primary_culture.label: Primary Culture
primary_culture.description: The primary culture of the nation

primary_religion.label: Primary Religion
primary_religion.description: The primary religion of the nation

vassal_type.label: Vassal Type
vassal_type.description: The type of vassal of the nation

disobey_chance.label: Chance to Disobey
disobey_chance.description: Percentage chance for this nation to disobey a vassal action from their overlord

rebellion_chance.label: Chance to Rebel
rebellion_chance.description: Percentage chance for this nation to Rebel against their overlord

concessions_chance.label: Chance to Demand Concessions
concessions_chance.description: Percentage chance for this nation to demand concessions from their overlord

concessions_qty.label: Concessions Amount
concessions_qty.description: Number of resources demanded each time concessions are demanded

vassals.label: Vassals
vassals.description: The list of vassals currently under the control of the nation

diplomatic_relations_1.label: Diplomatic Relations
diplomatic_relations_1.description: The list of relations this nation has with other nations

diplomatic_relations_2.label: Diplomatic Relations
diplomatic_relations_2.description: The list of relations this nation has with other nations

pop_count.label: Pop Count
pop_count.description: The amount of pops the nation has

pops.label: Pops
pops.description: The list of pops in the nation

unique_minority_count.label: Minority Count
unique_minority_count.description: The amount of unique minorities the nation has

district_slots.label: District Slots
district_slots.description: The amount of districts the nation can have

government_type.label: Government Type
government_type.description: The type of government of the nation

succession_type.label: Succession Type
succession_type.description: The way the next leader of the nation is selected

nomad_camp_type.label: Nomad Camp Type
nomad_camp_type.description: The type of camp a nomadic nation currently has

conscription_type.label: Conscription Type
conscription_type.description: How much of the nation's population can be mobilized during a war

military_funding.label: Military Funding
military_funding.description: How well funded the nation's military is

citizenship_stance.label: Citizenship Stance
citizenship_stance.description: How easy it is to get citizenship in the nation

foreign_acceptance.label: Foreign Acceptance
foreign_acceptance.description: How minority cultures and religions living in the nation are handled

subject_stance.label: Subject Stance
subject_stance.description: The way the nation tends to interact with its vassals

land_doctrine.label: Land Doctrine
land_doctrine.description: The nation's general approach to land based warfare

naval_doctrine.label: Naval Doctrine
naval_doctrine.description: The nation's general approach to aquatic warfare

diplomatic_stance.label: Diplomatic Stance
diplomatic_stance.description: The nation's default stance towards interacting with its neighbors

scientific_stance.label: Scientific Stance
scientific_stance.description: The degree to which the nation is geared towards technological development

economy_type.label: Economy Type
economy_type.description: The direction the nation's economy is specialized in

expansion_stance.label: Expansion Control Stance
expansion_stance.description: The nation's default stance towards unregulated expansion

mercenary_law.label: Mercenary Law
mercenary_law.description: The degree to which the nation's military is geared to employ mercenaries

consumption_stance.label: Consumption Stance
consumption_stance.description: The nation's stance towards whether food should be distributed in abundance or rationed

justice_stance.label: Justice Stance
justice_stance.description: The nation's stance on handling criminals

city_slots.label: City Slots
city_slots.description: The number of cities the nation's government can support without penalties

cities.label: Cities
cities.description: The number of cities the nation currently controls

defensive_pact_slots.label: Defensive Pact Slots
defensive_pact_slots.description: The number of defensive pacts the nation can support

military_alliance_slots.label: Military Alliance Slots
military_alliance_slots.description: The number of military alliances the nation can support

origin.label: Origin
origin.description: The origin the nation selected at creation

jobs.label: Jobs
jobs.description: The jobs that the pops of the nation are assigned to

land_unit_capacity.label: Land Unit Capacity
land_unit_capacity.description: The number of land units the nation can field at any given time

land_units.label: Land Units
land_units.description: The land units the nation has recruited

naval_unit_capacity.label: Naval Unit Capacity
naval_unit_capacity.description: The number of naval units the nation can field at any given time

naval_units.label: Naval Units
naval_units.description: The naval units the nation has recruited

resource_production.label: Resource Production
resource_production.description: The gross resource production of the nation

resource_consumption.label: Resource Consumption
resource_consumption.description: The resource consumption of the nation

resource_excess.label: Resource Excess
resource_excess.description: The net resource production of the nation

resource_storage.label: Resource Storage
resource_storage.description: The resource reserves of the nation

resource_capacity.label: Resource Capacity
resource_capacity.description: The resource reserves of the nation

resource_nodes.label: Resource Nodes
resource_nodes.description: The resource nodes of the nation

resource_node_values.label: Resource Node Values
resource_node_values.description: The value of the resource nodes of the nation

luxury_resources.label: Luxury Resources
luxury_resources.description: The luxury resources the nation has in their lands

technologies.label: Technologies
technologies.description: The technologies the nation has access to

wonders.label: Wonders
wonders.description: The list of wonders the nation currently owns

total_export_slots.label: Total Export Slots
total_export_slots.description: The total number of export slots the nation has available each session, before accounting for ongoing trades

total_import_slots.label: Total Import Slots
total_import_slots.description: The total number of import slots the nation has available each session, before accounting for ongoing trades

remaining_export_slots.label: Remaining Export Slots
remaining_export_slots.description: The number of export slots the nation has available this session, after accounting for ongoing trades

remaining_import_slots.label: Remaining Import Slots
remaining_import_slots.description: The number of import slots the nation has available this session, after accounting for ongoing trades

outgoing_trades.label: Outgoing Trades
outgoing_trades.description: The ongoing trades where the nation is currently exporting resources

incoming_trades.label: Incoming Trades
incoming_trades.description: The ongoing trades where the nation is currently importing resources

modifiers.label: Ongoing Modifiers
modifiers.description: The ongoing modifiers currently affecting this nation
